```golang
intent, err := state.NewIntent(cfg.IntentType, cfg.L1ChainID, cfg.L2ChainIDs)

```

This PR moves the assignment for `ConfigType` into `NewIntent` so that the code is more self-contained.

prs.title: Add command-based test harness for integration tests
prs.truncated_body:
Adds a composable integration test harness based on trait objects.

Each test step becomes now a `Command`:
- reusable
- checks preconditions
- applies state and asserts
- labels itself for traceability

New test steps can be added without modifying existing code.

Supports deterministic scenarios and can synthesize command sequences via `MADHOUSE=1`. Includes shrinking to isolate minima

nccs path/to/solution.sln
